title: Teamwork
description: Their first time as a trio. The team of Tank, Wunder and Pete will face their greatest challenge when they come up against RIP subject number 776, the deadliest Zombie yet. He's unpredictable , smart, full of cunning and has yet to be found.While they fight for their lives, the heat between Pete and Wunder will blaze out of control.They will discover powers within themselves brought on by being part zombie. Powers beyond even their wildest imagination. (
author: A.R. Von
